This will create the first part of the CAD model, which is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The dimensions of the prism are 2 units by 4 units by 6 units.</description>

Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. 5. Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis by 0.1596 units in both directions to create the 3D model of the rectangular prism. Part 2: Construct a cylindrical object Construct a 3D model of a cylindrical object with a tapered top and bottom. The object has a smooth surface and appears to be made of a reflective material.
